original_text: And Samson's wife was given to his companion, who had been his best man.
korean_text: 삼손의 아내는 삼손의 친구였던 그의 친구에게 준 바 되었더라

sentences.original_text: And Samson's wife was given to his companion
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 삼손의 아내는 그의 친구에게 주어졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: who had been his best man.
